name: Cube Run (Mase89)
description:
In this game, you play as a cube inside of an endless runner where you try to survive as long as you can without getting hit by the enemy cube. Rack up your score by collecting coins which are found every five to ten seconds.

     Also, this game cannot run on its own. I have always been into coding but never understood actually coding, so this game was made with Scratch. You will need Scratch (or Turbowarp) to play this project.
